did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Princess Anne County (Va.) County Court Records, 1816-1827
did.abstract: This collection forms part of the Robert Alonzo Brock Collection at The Huntington Library, San Marino, California.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Princess Anne County (Va.) Circuit Court. Records, 1816-1827, Robert Alonzo Brock Collection, Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Robert Alonzo Brock Collection was filmed by The Huntington Library in cooperation with The Library of Virginia with funding provided by The Library of Virginia Foundation with the support of The Roller- Bottimore Foundation and The Robins Foundation. Microfilm received 15 April 2004.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Princess Anne County was formed from Lower Norfolk County in 1691. Now extinct, it was incorporated into the city of Virginia Beach in 1963.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1816-1827, of Princess Anne County County Court consist of Commonwealth claims of various county officials (1819-1827) and certificates related to granting letters of administration to various estates (1822, 1824.)

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals are located at the Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.
